hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:We used to pray with the Prophet (ﷺ) and some of us used to place the ends of their clothes at the place of prostration because of scorching heat

chapter.ara-name: باب السُّجُودِ عَلَى الثَّوْبِ فِي شِدَّةِ الْحَرِّ
chapter.eng-name: To prostrate on a garment in scorching heat
